title: Forum theme
body: Not sure if this is the right section for this. The dark background really hurts my eyes and thus can't use this forum too much. Is there a way to select a lighter theme, white background? Thanks.

replies.body: There's currently no feature to change the theme on the Boards, but you can always request this feature on the [**Boards Feedback**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback) sub-boards!
